name: SimpleAudioVisualizer
description:
A Simple Audio Visualizer made with chilling to music in mind

I will hopefully be updating this every once and a while

Please report any bugs and feedback is highly appreciated!

FAQ:
Q: What is an Audio Visualizer?

A: Music visualization or audio visualisation,  generates animated imagery based on a piece of music. The imagery is usually generated and rendered in real time and in a way synchronized with the music as it is played. - Wikipedia

PS: In settings you can change the palette.
